overview_of_class: This course involves the study of the nature and diagnosis of psychiatric illness. We will also cover the basic treatments in a cursory fashion (this will be addressed in more detail in you Intervention series). Throughout the process of attending lectures, completing readings, and preparing for assignments, you will be exposed to a wide variety of mental disorders.
name: Psychopathology
title: WCAS PSYCH 421-1-20 Psychopathology

descriptions.name: Overview of class

Throughout the process of attending lectures, completing readings, and preparing for assignments, you will be exposed to a wide variety of mental disorders.

subject: PSYCH
